Row.Text: Capture defeted enimies as Builders. All cities you found or conquer, if in [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route range of your [ICON_Capital] Capital, they start with a road to it.
Additional Wildcard policy slot. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting on a continent other that your [ICON_Capital] Capital's.
Capture defeted enimies as Builders. Unit mantenece reduced per 1 Gold.

Spend Builder charges to complete 20% of the original district cost. When building Ancient and Classical wonders you may spend Builder charges to complete 15% of the original wonder cost. Builders receive an additional charge.

+15% [ICON_Production] Production towards districts and wonders if placed next to a River. Floodplains do not block placement of districts and wonders. All tiles next to a river gain 1 [ICON_Food] Food.

+10% faster growth for cities not on your original [ICON_Capital] Capital's continent. +15% [ICON_Gold] Gold in cities not on your original [ICON_Capital] Capital's continent. Additional Military policy slot. Units gain the ability to enter Ocean tiles after researching the Shipbuilding technology.

+15% [ICON_Production] Production towards districts and wonders if placed next to a River. [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes between multiple continents receive bonus [ICON_Gold] Gold for routes to other civilizations, and bonus [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Production] Production for routes between your own cities.
Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes earn +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for passing through Trading Posts in your own cities. +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when occupying a district or Fort.

Spend Builder charges to complete 20% of the original district cost. When building Ancient and Classical wonders you may spend Builder charges to complete 15% of the original wonder cost. Builders receive an additional charge.
One extra Wildcard policy slot in any government.
+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing in all cities with at least 2 specialty districts. 35% more City Growth than usual.
When they eliminate a unit, they heal up to 50 hit points. Land units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in land tiles adjacent to Coast.
Builds Encampment and Holy Site districts in half the time. +100% Commercial Hub and Harbor district adjacency bonuses. All distrincts gain +1[ICON_Faith] Faith next to coast tiles.

Inquisitors can Remove Heresy one extra time. Combat units have a bonus of +4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against players following other Religions. When you capture a Barbarian Outpost, receive a Tribal Village reward in addition to the usual [ICON_Gold] Gold.
Those Who Sing the Song of the Earth

Automatically receive the final Great Prophet when the next-to-last one is claimed (if you have not earned a Great Prophet already). Forest tiles provide +1 adjacency bonus for Holy Site, and Theater Square districts. Has 1 level of [ICON_VisLimited] Diplomatic Visibility greater than normal with every civilization that she's met.
Doubles [ICON_Faith] Faith yield from Holy Site district buildings. Opposing civilizations receive double the war weariness for fighting against the Children of Forest.
